description.raw:
This branch provides a set of Puppet manifests to setup an OpenStack cloud in a Vagrant virtual machine. Puppet manifests for preparing CloudSim are included too, which will serve as the basis for fully setting up CloudSim in a future branch.

You'll need Vagrant 1.2.3 and VirtualBox 4.2.16, please download them from http://vagrantup.com and https://www.virtualbox.org respectively. Heather (@hboortz) and I tested this branch on an Ubuntu 12.04 host.

Please have a look at the README.vagrant.md file, which includes instructions on how to start and manage the Vagrant machine, along with steps for setting up the network with VirtualBox.

title.raw: Add support for setting up an OpenStack cloud via Vagrant
